sqlset.name: SERVICE_DESK
sqlset.sql-query:
SELECT SCM_ID FROM AC_SD_SCM
<#compress> WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ${data.objectType} AND OBJECT_ID = ${data.objectId} <#if filter?? && ( filter.filters?size > 0 ) > <#list filter.filters as item > <#if item.logic??>${item.logic}</#if> ${item.field} <#if item.value?? > <#if item.operator == "startswith" && item.value?? > LIKE '${item.value}%' <#elseif item.operator == "eq" > = '${item.value}' <#elseif item.operator == "neq"> != '${item.value}' <#elseif item.operator == "gte"> >= ${item.value} <#elseif item.operator == 'lte'> <= ${item.value}</#if> <#else> <#if item.operator == "eq" > IS NULL <#elseif item.operator == "neq"> IS NOT NULL </#if> </#if> </#list></#if> <#if sort?? && ( sort?size > 0 ) > ORDER BY <#list sort as item > ${item.field} ${item.dir} </#list><#else> ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC </#if> </#compress>
SELECT SCM_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION , URL, USERNAME, PASSWORD, TAGS , CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM AC_SD_SCM WHERE SCM_ID = ?
INSERT INTO AC_SD_SCM ( SCM_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, NAME, DESCRIPTION , URL, USERNAME, PASSWORD, TAGS , CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE AC_SD_SCM SET NAME, DESCRIPTION , URL, USERNAME, PASSWORD, TAGS , MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE SCM_ID = ?
